Quickstrike:










Quickstrike was getting mad. Now this idiot Crow Lord was getting in their 
way in trying to get his repairs. He was going to have none of this. He 
lunged his cobra tail forward, with it hissing, saying, "Get outta our way, 
tin-horn b'fore ah pump ya full of vemom!" He hated when little bots came 
around and popped up, threathen him and his "comrades". If this bot was 
going to start something, he was ready. ---So he hoped.
